question: Who has been appointed the new Governor of Jammu & Kashmir (J&K)?
explanation: Satya Pal Malik has been appointed the new Governor of Jammu & Kashmir.  He will replace N N Vohra. Prior to this post, Malik was the Governor of Bihar. On 21 August, other governors of states appointed were Lal Ji Tandon for Bihar,  Ganga Prasad for Sikkim, Tathagata Roy for Meghalaya and Kaptan Singh Solanki for Tripura. Satyadev Narayan Arya was appointed as the Governor of Haryana while Baby Rani Maurya was appointed as the Governor of Uttarakhand.
